# Cursed Dragonmark (Spell)
## Overview
[[Necromancy Spells|Necromancy]]

**Level:** [[3rd Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 3]], [[4th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 4]], [[4th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 4]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 5th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 5]], [[BoXM 7th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 7]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, Dr

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Target:** One dragonmarked creature

**Duration:** Permanent

**Saving Throw:** Will negates

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Dragonmarked (WotC), pg. 149

*You trace a pattern in the air with your hand as this spell is cast. In response, the targetâ€™s dragonmark seems to twist and curl in.*

Every time the target creature attempts to use or expend one of its dragonmark powers, there is a 50% chance that the attempt fails, wasting that use of the mark. A *cursed dragonmark* can be restored to normal with a *[[Break Enchantment (Spell)|break enchantment]]*, *[[Limited Wish (Spell)|limited wish]]*, *[[Miracle (Spell)|miracle]]*, *[[Remove Curse (Spell)|remove curse]]*, or *[[Wish (Spell)|wish]]* spell.

*Dragonmark:* Any true or aberrant dragonmark.
